title: Reuse-Centered Knowledge Management-Based Mathematical Learning Object Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: A course for current elementary teachers to systematically manage and utilize reusable digital learning resources for improving mathematics instruction.

learning_goals: Learners classify digital resources by math concepts and design metadata using a learning object reuse framework.
Learners implement the creation-evaluation-sharing process of learning objects according to a knowledge management lifecycle model.
Through project-based assessments, learners develop reusable math learning activity packages and incorporate peer feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
